title: New Lissandra skin
body:
Elderwood {{champion:127}}  or some sort of tree. 
{{champion:127}} is a large tree, her q is a branch that splits into splinters, her w is roots that come out of the ground, her E is one large root that she pops out of and her ult make her grow into a huge tree with leafs and flowers.

replies.body: i can see this happening, good idea {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i can imagine that, and with my (lack) vivid imagination, it looks awesome

dont know who would downvote this, that would be the best elderwood skin so far. but then again theres a ton of other more interesting stuff to do. not that i really care, i just wanna see anything. nobody needs a skin more than her, besides yorick but, he might get one with his rework. zac just got a skin so now shes most deserving
